mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (user_id, created_time, title, contents, price, image, board_category, challenge_id) VALUES (id_seq.nextval, NOW(), #{title}, #{contents}, #{price}, #{image}, #{board_category}, #{challenge_id});
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, price = #{price}, image = #{image}, board_category = #{board_category}, challenge_id = #{challenge_id} WHERE id = #{id}
